title: Doublelift and Aphromoo ALLSTARS

embed.description: Aphromoo talks about the CLG situation on stream- Doublelift, Coach Chris, Pobelter, Wildturtle, Support him - http://www.twitch.tv/aphromoo Enjoyed this video?! Subscribe here - http://bit.ly/1HmaK1y . I will be doing a big RP giveaway at 5k Subs Twitter for updates https://twitter.com/Neb_by watch my other vids too! ...................__ ............./´¯/'...'/´¯¯`·¸ ........../'/.../..../......./¨¯\ ........('(...´...´....

body:
**Watch the video above before continuing.**

If you havent seen it yet, Aphromoo released a video _linked_ stating that Doublelift said that him and Aphromoo weren't friends. And, considering they're now on seperate teams, and apparantly have confusions about their relationship together, I reckon it would be great to reunite the two in ALL STARS. This would be amazing... please up vote this if you agree.

replies.body: reunite them for allstars? no, that would be awkward af
Poor them because it looks like it could happen. Doublelift currently has 52%, and aphromoo 42%. Only bjersen has more at 72%
yeah changed my mind and voted for them. i dunno if it'll happen though, it could be another "me or him"
